entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Stirling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:44 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Snow mixed with ice pellets late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
